Review: Beautiful area of Amsterdam. Near Krainnest and Biljmer Arena. Also a nice camping park, river and soul rounding
Home, the lake is full of beaches, perfect for a walk in the woods
A beautiful and suitable place to rest in the bosom of nature or integrate in a group, for walks alone or with another person, for a picnic and jogging, clean, green and close to animals
Het honden strandje is goud waard
Great pace to be with friends and family
Nice place to visit in spring and summer, very relaxed view
As advertised. A lake. Pretty good one at that
Beautiful park, quiet, safe, people fish and swim... you can see birds and fish! Recommended to visit like so many natural parks in this beautiful Amsterdam 🇳🇱👏 …
Heerlijk zwemmen, wandelen, hond uitlaten en genieten van natuur!
this place is beautiful... the river has transparent water and if possible stay until sunset 🌞 an unforgettable image. …
Love this place, have had a lot of Family  BBQ's here. Nice park for a all ages. Must see place. This have had some changes over the year, yet it is the same.
So beautiful park to walk, run or have a bbq, picnic
Mooi natuur gebied en dat in Amsterdam.
kan hier lekker rustig wandelen, picnikken bbqen....en eventueel zwemmen.
Rondje Gaasperplas = een uur wandelen of half uurtje joggen :)
Mijn favoriete stuk natuur. Heerlijk om rond de plas te wandelen.
Visited the park. There is a small artificial beach there. However the park is not well maintained I think.
Het Gaasperplas is een mooie verbindingsplaats tussen Amsterdam Zuidoost en Weesp. Een leuke locatie voor hardlopers en fietsers.
You will understand what peace is. If you are disturbed or irritated, come and visit this place. Green and blue will give relief to your mind
Really nice park/lake/forest-ish to walk, run,bike around and swim. Also possible to windsurf here. Overall a nice walk!
This place is like heaven on earth! I would spend hours watching the birds and feeling the breeze in my hair. Endless green fields, rabbits everywhere and nice people walking their dogs..
Leuk park om met de hond te lopen
A relatively unexplored spot to witness beautiful sunsets ❤️. The place also has a dog park with a tiny beach full of little paw impressions on the sand!
Mooie plas, mooi park om met mijn 2 Berners te lopen
Love the nature. Gives a peaceful vibe, during summer you can go picnic there.
Heerlijk rondje wandelen rondom de Gaasperplas (5km). Voor de hond zijn er 2 zwemstranden (1 klein en 1 groot) langs de route. Van 15 oktober t/m 15 april mag je overal los ook op de mensen stranden.
Al meerdere keren deze plas in het rond gevaren op het Supboard.
Close to the center and yet wonderfully quiet
Just great for a walk. Campsite around the corner and S-Bahn to the center of Amsterdam very close. Great for sightseeing

Gaasperplas is een openbare park waar de groten onder de raggea artisten als Morgan Heritage, Alborosie,Tarrus Riley, third world, Etana, Ziggy Marley, kimani Marley en nog vele anderen optreden.
In de zomer maanden is het elk jaar, een verrassing welke artiesten, door de organisatie van reggae lake festival, naar binnen gehaald worden. Klantvriendelijk. Gedeeltelijk rolstoelvriendelijk met begeleiding. Het is zeer druk.  Lange wachtrijen voor kaarten, gaat toch vlot, openbare toiletten aanwezig. Honden aan de lijn. Bussen 41, 44, eind halte metro 53. gaasperplas. Van uit Station Duivendrecht overstappen op de metro 54 richtig CS en overstappen aan de van der Made weg op de metro 53, richting gaasperplas eindhalte voor dit grote reggae festival twee dagen lang.👍💯☮
Perfect place to hang out, not far from Amsterdam. If you want to get out of the city, this is the right place for you
Beautiful area with a lake in centre.. peaceful n relaxing place
Very good campsite for visiting Amsterdam. Close to Metro.

Geweldige lokatie
Ben er geweest op het Reggae lake festival 24 /25 Aug 2019
Super locatie met goede OV verbinding
Parkeer gelegenheid in de buurt
Goede overnachtings gelegenheden in en rond om het park
Camping Gaasper par
Tulpin
En hotel gaasperplas campina-hotel

In een woord geweldig
Tasty, beautiful, and for free! XD
Wonderful camping area not too far from the centre.
A great place to spend a picnic with family and friends
Very nice and big park, for fun and relaxing.
A very quiet town or neighborhood in Amsterdam, the metro arrives there so it is quite good if you travel to Amsterdam and want more tranquility
Great place to walk your dog!

A beautiful lake and surrounding woodland.But their are eastern Europeans living in those woods.And when they are drunk mostly in the evening,you should not go anywhere near that place.They are very aggressive.
A very beautiful park around a recreational lake in Amsterdam's South East area.
Mooi stukje natuur in een drukke stad. Plek ook van Reggae Lake Festival!
Niet erg groot maar leuk opgezet
Perfect for staying and going into town
Hier kun je nog genieten van een stukje natuur en rust t.o. in de drukke stad.
Hele mooie plek om tot rust te komen of te barbecuen! Rustige plek zonder toeristen.
Rustig mooie plaats om te wandelen en relaxen
Lekker op het hondenstrand geweest. De honden hebben lekker gespeeld en gezwommen.
Local recreation on the outskirts of Amsterdam, metro runs directly into the city of Amsterdam

Gaasperplas is a blue-green bubble of tranquillity with water as the central element. During the walk, the city feels far away but it isn't. Narrow white paths attract you with quiet corners and wooden benches. Beautiful nature to admire.
Amazing place, they should update the photos taken by Google

Was voor werk in de buurt,en daar het nogal warm weer was had ik zwemkleding en handdoek meegenomen. Na het werk even een duik genomen.  Heerlijk water,alleen veel begroeiing onder de waterlijn,zodat ik na een aantal meter zwemmen al de slierten tussen mijn vingers en tenen had. Evengoed lekker opgefrist. Nog even op handdoek gelegen en gezandstraald omdat het wat winderig was,dus na ong een uurtje weer vertrokken . Fijn strand,midden in Amsterdam !

The beach was nice but nothing special.
However, we were very pleasantly surprised by the dispensers where you can get sunscreen for free - very cool thing! By the way, they are very common on the beaches in Holland. Other countries could definitely learn something here.
Well, nice for sunbathing and chilling, but no thanks for swimming

This specific site on google is closed. However less than 500meters away is an open wide beach which has the Japanese restaurant mentioned in other comments and water sports.

The photos i added are from that site, just a few cms to the left on the map.
Ideaal strand om een kleurtje op te doen

Picnic on the beach and an unforgettable evening!! Absolute calm and very little frequented with activities (volleyball, badminton...) A little out of the way of the heart of Amsterdam but with public transport you are there in 30 40min!! And by bike in about thirty minutes!
Minder voorzieningen als vroeger. Prima om naartoe te gaan maar geen uitschieter.
Sad as any other place I previously visited in this depressing country.... Come here just to work and make money... Forget everything else including this "beach"...
It's cute but the parking is very expensive. There are a few restaurants.
There are many people on weekends. We went there at 3pm on a Saturday and there were many cars.
I spent a few hours at the beach with my daughter, she really enjoyed playing in the sand, some kiosks were closed, and the bathrooms weren't working.
not really nice... a lot of constructions work and not really much to see.
Not really clean, parking prices are just crazy expensive! We will visit this city for sure only one time.
Amsterdam was very windy, sometimes sunny, sometimes cold air and everything was more expensive
Nu nog een vrij troosteloze plek. Moet nog veel gebouwd gaan worden.
Wat een verrassing, in het centrum naar een prachtig strand met hele leuke strandtent
Clean beach and good to reach with tram.

IJBURG STRAND Clean beach and water. We saw a wheelchair with large pneumatic wheels. Beautiful view of Amsterdam. Easily accessible by car. Parking costs 3.50 per hour. The little snack bar closed at five o'clock. We had a nice meal in the adjacent restaurant Popi & Haas - in the building where Lalaland is located. The beach is partly closed by fences behind which bulldozers are still working with sand, pipes and water. Are we coming back? Yes of course!
An amazing resting place for a overcrowded tourist city such as amsterdam.
Very clean beach with fitness facility and beach volleyball field.

Mooi strand maar de regels zijn niet duidelijk voor veel mensen. Hondenpoep op voetpad en ook mensen gaan met hond op strand lopen, fietsers rijden op voetpad, zelf veel waarschuwingsborden. Reddingsberigade is aanwezig. Dit strand heeft een restaurant, informatiecentrum, sportscholen en WC. Parkeren is niet gratis.
Very nice there and you can relax well
Heerlijk strandje had alleen iets meer zand op mogen liggen
Oh, we were happy. Well visited. Clean water and enough parking spaces. Beach, toilets were clean.

Wat een vies strand zeg Je kinderen laten spelen tussen het Plastic en Sigaretten peuken. Zand is bijna zwart en vervuild. In de avond zit er fout volk dat nog meer afval door het raam van zijn auto gooit en aan het lachgas zit. NEE dank je voor deze plek. Ijburg zal nooit meer wezen wat het ooit geweest is. 1 grote vieze cement bak.

It's nice and clean and can be reached by tram + 15 minutes on foot. On the right a shop with fresh fruit looked really good. Small section of beach, the rest is closed to children, separated swimming area. As always, unfortunately no shower, which is a bit stupid when you have to take the tram all over the city. I can't understand a shower wouldn't be a problem. Water was almost not salty no jellyfish. No trash really great!
Not very crowded, lots of space.
Make a floor of colourful stones or white marble upto the two borders in water. And if possible then place a water filtration system to free water from germs and dirt.
Good beach, there is strong wind
Is a good, stable beach. With lots of space. it even has a bar and an Asian restaurant.
Mooi strand met veel faciliteiten. Het heet overigens Strand IJburg - niet meer Blijburg. En het ligt tegenwoordig 100 meter ten noordwesten vanaf de aangegeven locatie aan de binnenbaai….

Very nice and big beach. Water is pretty shallow, but quite warm, so not very swimming friendly, but it's perfect for a family/group day at the beach.
Not many stores around, bring snacks and other things from home or buy them in IJburg(from the last markt there is a 10 minute walk to the beach).

Only the small part to the west is accessible, the photos are no longer correct!
Everything else is an ugly construction site and cordoned off with fences.
But even the accessible part isn't pretty.
This is absolutely not worth it.
From Amsterdam you probably have to go to Zandvoort to see a decent beach.
During summer must be. Still uncovered gem of the city
Beautiful place. A lot of restaurants and facilities around. Easy to get from Amsterdam. Would definitely go back

No respect I had let go of my dogs because I had lots of dogs off leash and they come to attack me because I had to leave and hold my dogs because he accepted Not have him dogs But have other dogs dogs could. And starts to want it's a fight

Very nice beach. You have a nice view of part of Amsterdam.
Unfortunately the half is closed and you cannot go to the other end of the beach. It's very clean there
Nice beach but currently closed due to construction work.
It's Closed till May 2022 . Please plan your visit accordingly. It has one Japanese restaurant open inside so you can relax and have some Break even if beach is closed .
Is wel leuk maar wel vaak te druk
Good place to go during summer time
It was pretty clean there, nice people
Large and well attended in summer
Muddy, toilet less after some point in the day with a nice construction dust wind so, cool for watersports

This artificial beach on the artificial lake of Amsterdam looks like a natural beach, except that the water is soft, and if there are fewer people than in zandwoort.

Beach volleyball court, beach soccer field, windsurfing field. All this 20 minutes from the center of Amsterdam by tram (the 26 behind the station).

Very nice beach. These are main highlight of this place.
- It has car and cycle parking facility.
- Near the beach you have supermarket and restaurants.
- On the beach they have snacks options, toilet and tap drinking water.
- kids friendly beach

13Km from Cs Amsterdam, family beach, quite big beach, nothing for young let’s say music, bars etc. Just a big beach with shallow waters for kids and families. There is a lifeguards around all times to help etc
Best amsterdam beach with valleyball nets!
Wow, is it artificial beach or a real one .

A large area. Nice entrance and parking. There is water for those who want to bathe.
You can have a great time in company or read a book alone.
With tram 26 we arrive at this beach discovered last year. The Deen supermarket where you can buy something to eat, including sliced pineapple. Place where you relax. I recommend.
erg leuke plek om " te relaxe"  in de zomer, maar word nu veels te druk, en veels te veel " wilde"  kinderen,  te populair aan het worden!

Het is wat raar maar toch ideaal gebleken. Dempen van een stukje Ijsselmaar en er huizen op bouwen. Hele vreemde vormen van huizen, drijvendehuizen of een flat. Maar het oogt als een gewone woonwijk. Maar dat is het natuurlijk niet. Je kan makkelijk op de fiets en voor je het weet sta je naast het Muiderslot. Genoeg natuur en recreatie mogelijkheden. Zo kan je heerlijk chillen op het strand van IJburg. Hele gezellige plek waar het goed vertoeven is. #xanderbw

Excellent, we came here by bike from Aachen and illegally stayed overnight on the beach because it was only a stopover, the evening and the morning were nice to look at, the local people are in a great mood too

It was a lake, but it was the same as the sea. It is spacious and beautiful. I think that the image is Lake Biwa, but it feels more like a beach than Lake Biwa, so the sea is closer. Because it is a sandy beach, you cannot enter by car even if you make a mistake. It's hard to escape if you get stuck like a child.
Currently under construction, the beach area is very small, so let's expect it in 2021!

small section for visitors at the moment (19.08.) open, clean but around construction fences and construction work. Not the prettiest beach but close to town, water quite clean and pleasant. Access free of charge, but parking is a whopping €3.50/hour.
I thought it was very nice here, we were there as a family 🤙🏽 …
Nice beach area in the city’s. Easy access by car or bike. Big sand area with sport facilities.
Not the nicest beach, was very crowded. However, the area around it is very relaxing.
Always clean, tidied up every day, enough space for everyone. Free entry.
Super gezellig, maar nadelen dan véél kinderen die rennen bijna over jou hoofd heen
Nice Beach that is alive in the evening as well!!!

Parking is free.
I think it's really a shame that garbage is left behind. A mother of color lets her son pee in the middle of the sea and nobody says anything. Although I called hello, she didn't want to hear me. Just disgusting. It would be nice if there was a view and there was no such thing.

Parking is way too expensive at €3.50 an hour, what's the point? I can go to the outdoor pool with my family and get it cheaper. The security guards are also busy checking. So my conclusion for a 2.5 hour drive and Dan was still poor in his wallet at the end of the day. It's better to look for something else and not let yourself be seduced by all the pictures like I did. And the free parking spaces were invented by a user. They don't exist anywhere.peace out
Very beautiful and spacious sandy beach. Well maintained and kept clean. Plenty of free parking spaces for cars available.
Some construction currently, else it's amazing with a (cross)fit station free to use 💪🔥 …

Nice sea beach but as on 10/03/2020 it was under construction, so no one is allowed to enter into the Sea. No swimming, No Surfing..!!
Hope it will be open for all soon..
great beach for a day trip
Seems to be under construction that time.
Heel erg gezellig. Leuk strand. Ik kan het strand Blijburg van harte aanbevelen.
Klein maar fijn! Supermarkt in de buurt zeer handing.
Great place for weekend with kids
Al jaren bezoek ik Strand Blijburg. Het is daar wel mooi, maar soms wordt ie geblokeerd door fistivals etc etc.
Lovely sandy beach just a stones throw from Amsterdam.... amazing place
Perfect for a solo beach day
"Strand" Ze noemen het in de volksmond "Amsterdam aan Zee"
A relaxing beach 30 minutes from the center of Amsterdam, it feels good! Tramway no. 26 will take you directly to the Ijburg terminus then 10 minutes on foot.👍👍👍 🌞 …
Very clean beach. Great for relaxing.
Clean beach, lots of surfers and fitness surfers. Suitable for children to play and for dogs to run around. We thought it was really nice there.
Small beautiful village, with a beautiful small beach. We found it on the way home to Germany. Highly Recommended!!!
Dry wind like in the desert and the sea
Toch wel nice zo dichtbij de stad.

The beach closed down in October 2018, regret not checking first on Google after a 16km bike ride from Amsterdam West to get here 😂 the former site is now full of construction equipment. Don't bother wasting your time! …
Vreselijk leuk dat Blijburg aan zee...Wel idioot dat dat nou weer weg moet. Wat een gemis
A nice sandy beach not far from the capital city of Amsterdam. Easily accessible by metro.

Let's meet at The Beach Zakelijk Met vrienden of familie Particulier Heerlijk eten in The Beach Restaurant Geef elkaar fervency ja-woord in The Beach Trouwen Welcome to The Beach! The Beach is dé domestic strandlocatie van Nederland en is gevestigd in de oude bloemenveiling van Aalsmeer. It starts with approachable beach crossings
Amasing little spot ,about 30 mins cycling from the central, very quite, clean ,
Goed zwemmen, makkelijk parkeren, goede horeca. Jammer dat dit gaat verdwijnen.
Great place to spend a summer day. Unfortunately, this construction site will now be developed. A new beach will emerge soon, hopefully!
It's a cute little beach in Amsterdam. Nice place to lie down on sunny days. There are lots of water sports choose from.
Nice but overcrowded on summer days, difficult and expensive parking, but overall best cool-down you can get in Amsterdam

Stunning beach in Amsterdam. Great personal discovery. Good atmosphere, possibility to buy something to eat and drink on site.
We preferred to take advantage of the store 10min walk from the beach in order to drink our beers at a lower cost.
Family atmosphere and beach wide enough to find your little corner of peace.

Erg gezellige tent als je er binnenkomt. Er komt al snel een ober onze bestelling opnemen. Een koffie en een biertje... makkelijker kan niet. Na ongeveer 15 minuten. (we zaten vlakbij de bar en we konden alles zien) werd eindelijk onze koffie en bier gemaakt. De bar medewerkers stonden te kletsen, lanterfanten en en liepen sloffend door de zaak. Er stond een dienblad met bier en limonade te wachten op een serveerster en die kwam na 10 minuten pas het dienblad halen. Achter de bar werd gezellig gekletst en iedereen keek naar ons en zagen ons niks drinken.
Natuurlijk weet ik dat er op een warme dag niet echt schot in de zaak zit maar ik heb in de horeca gewerkt en weet dat het veeeeeeeeeel professioneler kan!!! Het was een teleurstelling.
Great find for our third trip to Amsterdam. A beach where you can cool off in the summer with a relaxed atmosphere:) go for it!
Nice place to see in Amsterdam
Lovely beach. Visit it whilst you can as they’re moving it elsewhere soon haha
Parking only possible with credit card.
very nice and quiet. Beach volleyball courts are also available. Nice sand but very hard after a while. 😂 …

You can get here by tram in around 20 mins from Dam square. €3 one way..Beach is very clean and busy. Great restuarant and ammenities here also. Look out for the big spade and the path follows down to the beach.
Beach with facilities available. Not the prettiest location
Had a lovely time, not very pretty and neat
Mooi weer is a must hier, 2 keer Pleinvrees was erg geslaagd!

Nice vibe to this place although the day we visited was super busy and the beach area was packed. There had been a festival the day and night before and a large part of the beach was closed off.
It's on the tip of the furthest island in Amsterdam so it is a bit of a trek by bike and even the tram from the centre takes a while.
Overall pretty good.
Wel leuk, maar voelt een beetje alsof je midden in een bouwput zit!

Van Blijburg werd ik altijd blij maar nu niet. Er is nu helemaal geen bediening meer, rijen bij de kassa om te bestellen. Vieze tafels, vaatdoekjes in het raam, volop vliegen bij de keuken. Dagsoep zou linzensoep zijn en we krijgen tomatensoep. Bij navraag bleek er die dag geen linzensoep te zijn (huh?! terwijl dat duidelijk was gezegd). Wel met excuses dat er iets in de communicatie niet goed was gegaan. Uiteraard lekker om buiten te zitten, dat wel, maar er kan écht wel wat worden verbeterd aan service en kwaliteit.
Leuke plek. Het blijft behelpen als je het vergelijkt met Italië, Zuid-Frankrijk of Goa, maar met mooi weer superleuk
Heerlijk eten. Drankje drinken binnen bij het haardvuur.
Mooi omgeving voor in de zomer. Vooral op de avond.
Bediening is matig geïnteresseerd, maar sfeervolle locatie aan een echt Amsterdams strand
Nice beach close to amsterdam central
Nice city beach for family, clean
Much needed bike ride out of the city!
Goed alternatief wanneer er naar de zeestranden een enorme file staat voor Amsterdammers.
Blijburg ligt nu op een ronde punt van IJburg waardoor er strandzicht is naar drie kanten. Strand Blijburg is het hele jaar open, een fijne  plek zowel binnen als buiten.
